title: Lol not working
body: Hey Guys my lol told me that it had found some possible corrupted files so i clicked yes to fix it and then it started updating afterwards. when it got to step 2/2 at 99% it said 'unspecified error' and now my lol doesn't work. Please help anyone {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}{{item:3151}}.

replies.body: Have you tried running the patcher in admin mode?
Yep nothing changed thanx for trying horsie XD
Have you tried completely uninstalling, resetting your computer, and then reinstalling? Be warned, without backing up your item sets and configuration they will all be reset to their defaults.
All g i fixed it by uninstalling and updating it ty for your help
Awesome. Good luck on the fields of waifus!
